entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wynyard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wynyard 10:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -27.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -32.7°C
Wind: SW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 22.
